mapper.update:
update order_commission
order_detail_uuid = #{orderDetailUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_open_id = #{parentOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grandpa_open_id = #{grandpaOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_commission = #{parentCommission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
grandpa_commission = #{grandpaCommission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
actual_parent_commission = #{actualParentCommission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
actual_grandpa_commission = #{actualGrandpaCommission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
is_success = #{isSuccess,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
do_time = #{doTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
do_type = #{doType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
reserve = #{reserve,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update order_commission set order_detail_uuid = #{orderDetailUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_open_id = #{parentOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grandpa_open_id = #{grandpaOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_commission = #{parentCommission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, grandpa_commission = #{grandpaCommission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, actual_parent_commission = #{actualParentCommission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, actual_grandpa_commission = #{actualGrandpaCommission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, is_success = #{isSuccess,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, do_time = #{doTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, do_type = #{doType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, reserve = #{reserve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(parent_commission),0) FROM order_commission LEFT JOIN goods_order_detail ON goods_order_detail.uuid = order_commission.order_detail_uuid LEFT JOIN goods_order ON goods_order.uuid = goods_order_detail.order_uuid WHERE goods_order.order_status != 0 AND goods_order.order_status != 5 and goods_order.is_delete = 0 and order_commission.is_success = 0 and order_commission.parent_open_id = #{openId}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(grandpa_commission),0) FROM order_commission LEFT JOIN goods_order_detail ON goods_order_detail.uuid = order_commission.order_detail_uuid LEFT JOIN goods_order ON goods_order.uuid = goods_order_detail.order_uuid WHERE goods_order.order_status != 0 AND goods_order.order_status != 5 and goods_order.is_delete = 0 and order_commission.is_success = 0 and order_commission.grandpa_open_id = #{openId}
